title: Yewon Kang
text:
PhD Student | Reading + Learning Lab
Educational Psychology | University of Minnesota

title: About
text: Hi! My name is Yewon (pronounced Yeah-Won) Kang. I am a 4th year PhD student in Educational Psychology at the University of Minnesota. My research focuses on cognitive processes related to learning and memory and their applications in education. I am currently working in the Reading + Learning Lab, advised by Dr. Panayiota Kendeou. I also serve as the Instructional Technology Fellow for the School of Social Work, assisting instructors in making effective use of educational technology tools and resources.
